primevc.gui.core.IUIElement

type
interface
implements
primevc.gui.traits.IPropertyValidator
primevc.gui.traits.IStylable
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
primevc.core.traits.IIdentifiable
primevc.gui.traits.IBehaving
primevc.gui.traits.ILayoutable
primevc.gui.display.IDisplayObject

Instance Variables

effects : primevc.gui.effects.UIElementEffects

Collection of effects that are defined for this UIElement. The UIElementEffects object won't be created by an UIElement but has to be set the first time an effect is added to the UIElement.

state(default,null) : primevc.gui.states.UIElementStates

system(getSystem,null) : primevc.gui.managers.ISystem

Reference to the window manager objects

Instance Methods

attachLayoutTo(target : primevc.gui.layout.ILayoutContainer, ?pos : Int) : IUIElement

returns
own-instance
Method will attach the layout-client of this UIElement to the given ILayoutContainer.

attachTo(target : IUIContainer, ?pos : Int) : IUIElement

returns
own-instance
Method will attach this UIElement to the given IUIContainer, including it's layout.

attachToDisplayList(t : primevc.gui.display.IDisplayContainer, ?pos : Int) : IUIElement

Method will call attachDisplayTo method and then play the added-to-stage effect if one is defined.

changeDepth(newPos : Int) : IUIElement

changeLayoutDepth(newPos : Int) : IUIElement

detach() : IUIElement

returns
own-instance
Method will detach this UIElement from it's parent, including it's layout. If there's removed-from-stage effect, it will play first.

detachLayout() : IUIElement

returns
own-instance
Method will detach the layout-client of this UIElement from it's layoutcontainer.

hide() : Void

isDisposed() : Bool

isInitialized() : Bool

isResizable() : Bool

function to tell other objects if the element can be resized

move(newX : Int, newY : Int) : Void

resize(newW : Int, newH : Int) : Void

rotate(newV : Float) : Void

scale(newX : Float, newY : Float) : Void

show() : Void
